segments.text: I've been standing here since half past seven . Where on earth have you been ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm terribly sorry I'm late . I just couldn't help it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's really very easy saying you're sorry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , just give me a chance . I can explain it .
segments.speaker: S2
